name: Flowing Red Silk Sash
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
The Flowing Red Silk Sash speeds its user's combat.
The Flowing Red Silk Sash is an artifact of Kirvana.
